CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Borealis Research Hub relative to Arcane University Library?
SRP.A: Borealis Research Hub is {above} Arcane University Library in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aethelgard Art Library relative to Celestial College Archives?
SRP.A: Aethelgard Art Library is {below} Celestial College Archives in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Celestial College Archives relative to Aethelgard Art Library?
SRP.A: Celestial College Archives is {above} Aethelgard Art Library in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total library visits?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Aethelgard Art Library}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total library visits?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Celestial College Archives}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Arcane University Library's maximum Library Visits in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Arcane University Library's maximum Library Visits is in {2000}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Zenith Tech Library's maximum Library Visits in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Zenith Tech Library's maximum Library Visits is in {2001}.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 1997, was the average total Library Visits higher or lower than between 1986 and 2001?
NC.A: The average total library visits between 1985 and 1997 was {lower} than between 1986 and 2001.

NC.Q: Was the total Library Visits in 1986 higher or lower than in 1990?
NC.A: The total library visits in 1986 was {lower} than in 1990.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 1996, did the total Library Visits experience a larger or smaller change than between 1978 and 1997?
NC.A: The change in total library visits between 1991 and 1996 was {smaller} than between 1978 and 1997.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1986, did the total Library Visits experience a larger or smaller change than between 1984 and 1991?
NC.A: The change in total library visits between 1981 and 1986 was {smaller} than between 1984 and 1991.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Aethelgard Art Library} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Arcane University Library and Celestial College Archives first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Arcane University Library and Celestial College Archives first exchanged leading positions in {1979}.
